reviews.text: It was dark when I arrived, and the hotel had been taken over by a noisy wedding party. The whole building heaved with the noise of the disco. Of course, such bookings are profitable to the hotel, but doesn't management ever think about other guests on such occasions?

reviews.title: Excellent!!
reviews.text: I recently stayed at the Heronston while visiting Brigend with my family and partner - Well, what can i say except it was fantastic. The rooms were spacious and clean. Every member of staff i dealt with were extremely helpful and polite. The leisure facilities were always clean and welcoming (I spent a lot of time in there). We only stayed and a bed and breakfast basis so decided to sample the Sunday Lunch - oh what a delight, that was a delight aswell. Anyone thinking of going to bridgend - this Hotel is a must.

description: Best Western Heronston Hotel is the ideal location for both business and pleasure. The hotel is located in a semi rural area, but only half a mile from Bridgend town centre and minutes from Junction 35 of the M4. We are within easy reach of the dramatic Heritage Coastline and equidistant from our vibrant capital city of Cardiff & the cosmopolitan city of Swansea. The hotel boasts 75 well appointed non smoking bedrooms including suites, executive and standard rooms. The Heron Bar is the perfect place for pre dinner drinks, to order a light snack or bar meal. Our Crane Restaurant offers both an A la Carte and Table D’hôte menu, all food served is sourced locally and prepared and cooked freshly. We are able to offer a range of conference facilities from a small meeting for 2 up to a conference for 200 with all audio and visual requirements catered for. We have several banqueting suites which can cater for 8 up to 240 guests and our coordinators would be delighted to help assist you in organising your event. Our Leisure Club offers an indoor heated pool, sauna, steam room, spa pool and fully equipped gym. The pool area has been fitted with mood lighting, the ideal area to relax after a busy day. Here at the Best Western Heronston Hotel, we are always mindful that ‘our aim is to welcome you back’.
